statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT trial_end_date, trial_start_date, drug_name FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT company_name, drug_name FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT trial_id, company_name, patient_id FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT company_name, trial_start_date, trial_end_date FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE company_name LIKE '%pharma%';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT company_name, drug_name, trial_start_date FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE company_name LIKE 'Pfizer%' ORDER BY trial_start_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, drug_name, trial_start_date, trial_end_date FROM clinical_trial_data ORDER BY drug_name ASC, trial_start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, company_name FROM clinical_trial_data GROUP BY company_name, patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM company;
SELECT company_name, location FROM company;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trial;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date, company_id FROM clinical_trial;
SELECT company_name, location, trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM company JOIN clinical_trial ON company.company_id = clinical_trial.company_id;
SELECT * FROM company ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trial WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_name, location FROM company WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT company_id, company_name, location FROM company WHERE location IN ('Paris', 'London');
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trial WHERE start_date >= DATE '2021-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT trial_name, trial_phase FROM ClinicalTrials ORDER BY trial_phase DESC;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM Participants WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_id, result_type, result_value FROM TrialResults ORDER BY result_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT trial_name, trial_phase FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM Participants WHERE trial_id = 2 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE trial_phase = 3;
SELECT result_type, result_value FROM TrialResults WHERE result_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_companies
SELECT company_name FROM pharmaceutical_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC
SELECT trial_id, trial_start_date, trial_end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT trial_results.result_id, trial_results.result_description, clinical_trials.trial_id FROM trial_results INNER JOIN clinical_trials ON trial_results.trial_id = clinical_trials.trial_id
SELECT government_standards.standard_name, government_standards.standard_description FROM government_standards
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_name FROM pharmaceutical_companies WHERE company_id = 2;
SELECT trial_id, trial_start_date, trial_end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_id, trial_id, result_description FROM trial_results WHERE result_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM government_standards ORDER BY standard_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM PharmaceuticalCompanies;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM TrialParticipants WHERE trial_id = 3;
SELECT trial_id, start_date, end_date, status FROM ClinicalTrials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT standard_name, description FROM GovernmentStandards WHERE standard_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalCompanies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT company_name, location FROM PharmaceuticalCompanies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT trial_id, start_date, end_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY end_date ASC;

SELECT t.trial_id, tp.participant_name, tr.result FROM TrialResults tr JOIN ClinicalTrials t ON tr.trial_id = t.trial_id JOIN TrialParticipants tp ON tr.participant_id = tp.participant_id WHERE tp.age > 30;

SELECT s.standard_name, s.description, COUNT(tr.trial_id) AS num_trials FROM GovernmentStandards s LEFT JOIN ClinicalTrials tr ON s.standard_id = tr.trial_id GROUP BY s.standard_id HAVING num_trials > 5 ORDER BY num_trials DESC;
